Robert Morris is good for all students.
Seems pretty reasonably priced for the education I'm receiving.
Hang out with friends. School sports
Pretty simple so far. Classes are usually pretty fun. The teachers are really helpful if you have any questions
Be prepared to not get breaks. Robert Morris is a year round school so that takes some adjusting but its a really great school.
Robert Morris is a great school. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. I made a wonderful decision by coming here.

You also have to pay your books separately which could bring your tuition up even more., 6195=I visited the college and learned a lot that I'm sure would benefit me and my career. I plan to attend this University in July or September. Still dwelling but I'm going to attend this year. My major will be Culinary Arts. Cooking is my passion., 176057=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 123578=Robert Morris was my first choice since i was in 8Th grade, I enjoy the acceleration program. So far I have finished my Associates degree in Interior Design, and now I am working on my Bachelor's degree in Architecture technology, which I will be finishing in the spring 2013.}

Login to rate or flag the reviews Sara from Belvidere, IL 03/01/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 4 of 50 Categories Comments Great for these types of students It's a great place for those that are fresh out of high school. The structure of the place and it's classes are made for full-time students who are really committed to going to school and finishing quickly.
